game.logic.items

Class Key

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.logic.items.Key
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item

    public class Key
extends java.lang.Object
implements Item
    A key opens a specific door. Not every door requires a key.
    Author:
    Callum Gill 300316407 2015, Cameron Bryers 3000326848 MMXV
